fileManipulation
Class OpenOrSave

java.lang.Object
  fileManipulation.OpenOrSave

public class OpenOrSave
extends java.lang.Object

Author:
John Bannister

Provides static methods to open and save image files, open, save and read text files and get a pass-phrase. Used by recoverImage and createImage and the Image objects.

Field Summary

          a file chooser for open and save methods
